info.name: Dark Pivotal Tracker
info.description:
A dark version of the pivotaltracker.
For now, only the project-view is dark.
info.additionalInfo:
2015-10-21: Fixes to the creating/editing of a story
2015-11-11: Better Popups, Small fixes
2015-12-08: Better visibility for Github notifications, "start" Buttons made readable
2015-12-09: "start" Buttons made readable, again...
2016-01-19: Fix labels not displaying, Color the story-previews to differentiate between unstarted, started, etc.
2016-01-25: Dark Story-History, darken code-segments again
2016-02-01: Fix changed styling of flyover-comments
